# ruin

ر ي ن r-y-n
related to tarnish
related to deterioration
Form I: رَانَ‎ (rāna)
Active participle: رَائِن‎ (rāʾin)

𓍉 𓊪 𓅪 | ruin | خراب xarâb@Pers خ ر ب ḵ-r-b خَرَاب ḵarāb cripple

𓄿 𓈎 𓏲 𓅪 𓏥 | ruin, misfortune | iɣrman ighrman @Berber +++
